title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 465.2 - Notification to the child or representative
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 465.2 - Notification to the child or representative

State Regulations

Local social services districts and voluntary child
caring agencies shall provide information on the nature and use of the child
care review service to the child or his representative at the time of
application for foster care. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
465.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
